mcode_mappings.result: Pre- and post-chemotherapy tumor activity and metabolic change

mcode_mappings.primaryOutcome: Tumor metabolic activity and response to chemotherapy
secondaryOutcomes: Comparison of FDG and IUdR PET results
mcode_mappings.resultSummary: PET scans used to monitor chemotherapy effectiveness and tumor metabolism in locally advanced breast cancer.

source_text_fragment: PET Scans in Patients With Locally Advanced Breast Cancer. Study of I-124-Iododeoxyuridine and FDG PET scans to monitor DNA metabolism and glycolysis in tumor samples before and after chemotherapy.
